content: Great! I definitely love Instagram as a user, and I think it is really exciting to listen to the story from who created it. Personally I think that Instagram, has huge potential not only for photo sharing and social media, but also for social research purposes. For example I recently used Instagram data to analyse my home city activity and to spot user behaviour, which represents only a part of what you can investigate with Instagram open data. If you want feel free to take a look at my article: https://goo.gl/OthhPB :)
